name: The Boi!
description:
Take a breather and help the Boi match the color of the Pigeon's dreams.

You may see some familiar faces along the way...

This was made for the Fitchburg State Fall Game Jam of 2021, lasting 5 days.

Controls: Move with Joystick or WASD. Press Start on controller or Enter to start the game. Restart the game with R on Keyboard. Exit with  ESC.

Credits

Kris Camp - Producer, Programmer, Animator, Tech Artist

Veronica Hazen - 2D Artist, Animator

Dominic Malo - 2D Artist, UI

Kiria Bentley - 2D Artist, Animator

Special Thanks to Tori, Finman, Hotte, and Keegan! <3
